original_text: And if you do good to those who are good to you, what credit is that to you? Even sinners do that.
korean_text: 너희가 만일 선대하는 자만을 선대하면 칭찬 받을 것이 무엇이냐 죄인들도 이렇게 하느니라

sentences.original_text: And if you do good to those who are good to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 너희에게 선을 행하는 자들에게 선을 행하면

sentences.original_text: what credit is that to you?
